title: Exporting multiple files with the same name under different directories to a zip file fails
description: Steps to reproduce: 1. Open the 'Export' dialog window. 2. Select both projects that were created earlier. 3. Give the zip file a name (e.g., test.zip). 4. Click on the 'Export' button to begin exporting to the zip file.
OB: When attempting to export multiple files with the same name under different directories to a zip file, an error message box pops up. The error message indicates that there were problems encountered during the export process. The details of the error message specifically mention the file with the same name in 'project2' as the cause of the problem.
EB: The export process should complete successfully without any error messages. The zip file should be created and contain all the selected files, including those with the same name under different directories.
SR: 1. Open the 'Export' dialog window. 2. Select both projects that were created earlier. 3. Give the zip file a unique name. 4. Click on the 'Export' button to begin exporting to the zip file. Verify that the export process completes successfully without any error messages. Check that the zip file is created and contains all the selected files, including those with the same name under different directories.
